body_html:
MINGW32 on windows is not a tested/supported platform.
Therefore, I cannot really comment on how that might work, or if even GPU access correctly works on your setup.

I recommend heading to stackoverflow to reach out to community for help on your issue.
As the initial issue on ubuntu seems to be resolved/addressed, I will close this issue.

body:
MINGW32 on windows is not a tested/supported platform.
Therefore, I cannot really comment on how that might work, or if even GPU access correctly works on your setup.

I recommend heading to stackoverflow to reach out to community for help on your issue.
As the initial issue on ubuntu seems to be resolved/addressed, I will close this issue.
